relation: Taps or untaps a card on the battlefield that's under your cursor.
Increase or decrease life or Poison Counters by one.
Start the next turn, which may automatically untap all cards and draw a card.
Transform, Morph, or make a card facedown that's under the cursor.
Increase the power value, the toughness value, or the number of counters on a card by moving your cursor over the card, and pressing the 'q', 'w', or 'e' keys.
Draws a card from the library into your hand.
Focuses on the Draw by Name field. Type part of the name of a card, use the arrow keys and 'ENTER' to draw the card.
Focus on token dropdown. Type to search, and the 'ENTER' key will add the token.
a, b, y, Y, g, x
Pressing 'spacebar' zooms in on the card and displays additional card action buttons.
Simulates a roll of dice to generate random numbers.
Untaps all cards on the battlefield.
Toggles the visibility of the cards in your hand.
Decrease the power value, the toughness value, or the number of counters on a card by moving your cursor over the card, and pressing 'SHIFT' and the 'q', 'w', or 'e' keys.
Add a card to the Hand, Battlefield, Library, bottom of Library, Graveyard, or Exiled zones respectively.
Toggles the visibility of this Keyboard Shortcuts window.
Mulligan. Reduces the cards in hand by one.

textAfterTable: by Author Keyboard Shortcuts Settings These settings are saved in local storage on your browser. If you happen to clear your browser's cache, they will revert to their defaults. Auto Draw Auto Untap Auto Layout Enable 3D Transforms CSS 3D Transforms is supported in Safari 5, Google Chrome 15 (on capable computers), and Mobile Safari. This uses hardware acceleration and should improve framerates. Small Size Cards Medium Size Cards Large Size Cards Restore Defaults Log Previous Next Stats 5 in 5 in 5 in
